archimate:Requirement.name: 4.8.9 BYOD minimum configuration control
archimate:Requirement.documentation: Employee-owned devices attempting to connect to corporate networks and business applications should meet minimum configuration requirements, which specify that: the device has not been tampered with (e.g. jailbroken) the device is running the latest approved version of the operating system smartphones and tablets are protected by an Enterprise Mobility Management (EMM) system.
